PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2009-18222009-11-05PMO,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActInquiries Act
SubjectAmendment to Order in Council P.C. 2008-1958 of December 23, 2008
PrecisAmendment to Order in Council P.C. 2008-1958 of December 23, 2008, by changing to May 31, 2010 or before, the day on which the Commission on Inquiry into Certain Allegations Respecting Business and Financial Dealings Between Karlheinz Schreiber and the Right Honourable Brian Mulroney has to submit its report.
AttachmentsAttachment
